column1: process-latency-avg 	The average execution time in ns
process-latency-max 	The maximum execution time in ns
process-rate 	The average number of processed records per second across all source processor nodes of this task. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-task-metrics
process-total 	The total number of processed records across all source processor nodes of this task. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-task-metrics
commit-latency-avg 	The average execution time in ns
commit-latency-max 	The maximum execution time in ns
commit-rate 	The average number of commit calls per second. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-task-metrics
commit-total 	The total number of commit calls. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-task-metrics
record-lateness-avg 	The average observed lateness of records (stream time - record timestamp). 	kafka.streams:type=stream-task-metrics
record-lateness-max 	The max observed lateness of records (stream time - record timestamp). 	kafka.streams:type=stream-task-metrics
enforced-processing-rate 	The average number of enforced processings per second. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-task-metrics
enforced-processing-total 	The total number enforced processings. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-task-metrics
dropped-records-rate 	The average number of records dropped within this task. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-task-metrics
dropped-records-total 	The total number of records dropped within this task. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-task-metrics
active-process-ratio 	The fraction of time the stream thread spent on processing this task among all assigned active tasks. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-task-metrics
